name: Classic Cotton Round-Neck T-Shirt
description: Stylish & breathable cotton t-shirt for everyday wear.
detailed_desc: Crafted from premium 100% cotton, this classic round-neck t-shirt offers the perfect combination of comfort and style. Its breathable fabric and versatile fit make it suitable for casual outings, gym sessions, or layering under a jacket. Designed to withstand multiple washes without losing shape or color.

✅ Classic Fit – Not too tight, not too loose
✅ Reinforced Neckline – Keeps its shape after washes
✅ Machine Washable – Easy care and long-lasting durability
✅ Available in Multiple Colors – Choose your vibe

name: Men's Premium Cotton Polo T-Shirt
description: Smart & casual polo t-shirt – perfect for every occasion.
detailed_desc: Step up your smart casual game with this premium polo t-shirt from U.S. Polo Assn. Made from a soft cotton blend, it features a ribbed collar, short sleeves, and the signature logo embroidery. Ideal for office casuals, weekend hangouts, or layering under a blazer.

✅ Signature Polo Collar – Timeless design with button placket

✅ Versatile Styling – Pair it with jeans, chinos, or shorts

description: Trendy checked casual shirt – comfortable, breathable, and versatile.

name: Men's Slim Fit Formal Shirt
description: Premium formal shirt for men – perfect for office, meetings, and events.
detailed_desc: This slim fit formal shirt by Van Heusen is crafted for professionals who value both elegance and comfort. Tailored from high-quality cotton-blend fabric, it features a crisp collar, button-down front, and a subtle sheen. Ideal for business meetings, interviews, and formal occasions.

✅ Premium Cotton Blend – Soft, durable, and breathable
✅ Semi-Cutaway Collar – Stylish and versatile
✅ Easy Care Fabric – Wrinkle-resistant and machine washable
✅ Ideal for Formal Events – Office, conferences, or weddings

name: Men's Slim Fit Stretchable Jeans
description: Stylish and stretchable slim fit jeans – comfort meets modern fashion.
detailed_desc: These slim fit jeans by Levi’s combine durability with urban style. Crafted from stretch denim, they provide all-day comfort with a flattering fit. Designed with classic five-pocket styling and a mid-rise waist, these jeans are a versatile addition to any wardrobe, perfect for daily wear or casual outings.

✅ Stretchable Fabric – Enhanced flexibility and comfort
✅ Five-Pocket Design – Classic denim detailing

✅ Durable Stitching – Built to last for everyday use

name: Men's Classic Fit Formal Trousers
description: Elegant and professional formal trousers – a must-have for your workwear wardrobe.
detailed_desc: Upgrade your formalwear collection with these classic fit trousers from Van Heusen. Tailored with precision, these trousers are crafted from premium fabric for superior comfort and breathability. Perfect for business meetings, office wear, or formal events, they feature a flat front, zip fly with button closure, and a structured waistband for a clean, sophisticated look.

name: Men's Cotton Casual Shorts
description: Stay cool and stylish with these comfortable cotton shorts – made for casual days.
detailed_desc: Crafted from soft, breathable cotton, these Jack & Jones casual shorts are your go-to essential for warm days. Featuring a relaxed fit, multiple pockets, and a comfortable waistband, these shorts blend practicality with laid-back style. Pair them with tees or polos for a complete summer look.

name: Men's Cotton Trackpants
description: Ultra-comfy cotton trackpants for workouts, travel, or just chilling in style.
detailed_desc: These Puma trackpants are designed with comfort and performance in mind. Made from premium cotton blend fabric, they offer breathability, flexibility, and a sleek look. Whether you're training, lounging, or running errands, these trackpants have you covered. Features include an adjustable drawstring waist, ribbed cuffs, and deep side pockets.

name: Men's Winter Jacket
description: Stay warm and stylish with this premium winter jacket, designed for cold weather adventures.
detailed_desc: This North Face winter jacket is engineered for ultimate warmth and comfort. Featuring advanced insulation and water-resistant fabric, it's perfect for outdoor activities in the coldest conditions. The jacket comes with an adjustable hood, multiple pockets, and a sleek design to ensure you stay cozy and fashionable. Whether you're skiing, hiking, or simply braving the winter chill, this jacket is your perfect companion.

name: Men's Fleece Hoodie
description: Stay cozy and stylish with this soft fleece hoodie, perfect for everyday wear and workouts.
detailed_desc: This Adidas fleece hoodie combines comfort and performance. Made from a high-quality fleece fabric, it provides a warm, soft feel against the skin. With a roomy hood, ribbed cuffs, and a front kangaroo pocket, it’s designed for both style and function. Ideal for lounging, running errands, or layering up for your workout, this hoodie is your go-to for cooler days.

description: A beautiful floral midi dress, perfect for both casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Women's Jeggings
description: Comfortable and stylish jeggings that combine the look of jeans with the comfort of leggings.

Whether you're dressing up for a casual day out or lounging at home, these jeggings will keep you looking great and feeling comfortable.

name: Women's Cotton Kurti

name: Women's Ethnic Set
description: A beautiful ethnic set that blends traditional and contemporary designs, perfect for festivals and celebrations.
detailed_desc: This Fabindia women's ethnic set is crafted with intricate details and rich fabric to make you look elegant at any traditional or festive occasion. The set includes a beautifully embroidered kurta with matching palazzo pants and a dupatta. The kurta is made from soft cotton with delicate thread work, while the palazzo pants offer comfort and a stylish flow. The lightweight dupatta completes the look, adding grace and charm to your outfit. Whether it’s a family gathering or a festive celebration, this ethnic set is sure to make you stand out.

name: Women's Traditional Saree
description: A timeless traditional saree with intricate design and premium fabric, perfect for weddings and festive occasions.
detailed_desc: This Sabyasachi women's traditional saree is crafted from luxurious silk and adorned with intricate handwoven patterns that exude elegance and grace. The saree features a rich combination of vibrant colors and delicate embroidery along the borders, making it ideal for weddings, festivals, and other grand celebrations. The set includes the saree, a matching blouse piece, and a beautiful pallu that drapes perfectly, giving you a royal and sophisticated look.

✅ Intricate Handwoven Design – Traditional craftsmanship at its finest

✅ Vibrant Color Palette – Perfect for weddings and celebrations

name: Women's Bridal Lehenga
description: A stunning bridal lehenga designed for the most special occasions, featuring intricate embroidery and premium fabric.
detailed_desc: This Manish Malhotra bridal lehenga is the epitome of luxury and tradition. Made from rich satin silk and adorned with intricate hand-embroidery, sequins, and beadwork, this lehenga exudes elegance and charm. The lehenga comes with a beautifully embellished choli and a matching dupatta, making it the perfect outfit for weddings and festive events. The voluminous lehenga skirt creates a graceful, dramatic look, while the choli offers a fitted, flattering silhouette. This lehenga is designed to make you feel like royalty on your special day.
key_feat: ✅ Premium Satin Silk Fabric – Soft and luxurious for the ultimate bridal look
✅ Intricate Hand-Embroidery – Featuring delicate beadwork, sequins, and threads
✅ Flattering Choli – Fitted to enhance your silhouette
✅ Dramatic Lehenga Skirt – Voluminous design for an elegant, graceful look
✅ Complete Set – Includes lehenga, choli, and matching dupatta

name: Women's Sports Shoes
description: High-performance sports shoes designed for comfort and durability, perfect for running, training, and casual wear.
detailed_desc: These Nike women's sports shoes are engineered to provide maximum comfort, support, and durability during any activity. Featuring a lightweight, breathable mesh upper and cushioned sole, they ensure optimal airflow and cushioning for your feet. The rubber outsole provides superior traction, whether you’re running on the treadmill, hitting the gym, or walking outdoors. These shoes also have a sleek design that can easily be worn for casual outings, making them versatile for both fitness and everyday wear.
key_feat: ✅ Lightweight Mesh Upper – Offers breathability and keeps feet cool
✅ Cushioned Sole – Provides support and comfort during intense workouts
✅ Rubber Outsole – Superior grip and traction for stability
✅ Versatile Design – Suitable for running, training, or casual wear
✅ Sleek and Modern Look – Stylish design that pairs well with athletic or casual attire

name: Women's Knit Shrug
description: A cozy and stylish knit shrug, perfect for layering over casual or semi-formal outfits.
detailed_desc: This Forever 21 women's knit shrug is designed to provide the perfect layer for cooler days or evenings. Made from soft, stretchable knit fabric, it features an open-front design that can be easily paired with tops, dresses, or even tees. The long sleeves offer warmth without being too heavy, making it ideal for layering. Whether you’re heading to work or going out for a casual meet-up, this shrug adds a chic touch to any outfit.

✅ Open-Front Design – Easy to pair with different outfits
